entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is mentioned as someone who returned to care for the narrator's master and keep watch over him.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who was going to be told everything by the narrator's father.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is mentioned as someone who was attacked by Wormtail.

entities.name: the ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is mentioned as the recipient of letters from the narrator's father.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is mentioned as a place where the narrator was smuggled from.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is mentioned as a school that the narrator's father was heading for.

relationships.description: The narrator's father was heading for Hogwarts to tell Dumbledore everything.
Wormtail neglected his duty of keeping watch over the narrator's father and sending letters to the Ministry.
The narrator's father was heading for Hogwarts to tell Dumbledore everything.
Wormtail is related to the fact that the narrator was smuggled from Azkaban.
The Ministry received letters from the narrator's father, which were intended for Dumbledore.
Wormtail is related to the fact that the narrator's father was heading for Hogwarts.
Dumbledore is related to the fact that the narrator was smuggled from Azkaban.
